typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		TransactionID as integer,
		FromAccountNumber as integer,
		ToAccountNumber as integer,
		Amount as double,
		Status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SQL
source(output(
		TransactionID as integer,
		FromAccountNumber as integer,
		ToAccountNumber as integer,
		Amount as float,
		Status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CSV
source(output(
		TransactionID as integer,
		FromAccountNumber as integer,
		ToAccountNumber as integer,
		Amount as float,
		Status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Excel
SQL, CSV, Excel union(byName: true)~> Union1
